Name: Mexican Melon Ball
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Cut melon into eight segments and deseed. Cut cubes of flesh from skin of one segment and MUDDLE in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.
Review: Orange and melon laced with tequila.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered at the Flying V Bar & Grill, Tuscon, Arizona, USA.
